en.title: PlayPal
en.platform_intro: The social platform that connects gamers. Choose a game, discover like-minded players, and play together. Enrich your gaming experience by meeting new people and forming groups.
en.find_players_desc: Discover players who play the same games and quickly build a team to win together.
en.join_groups_desc: Join existing groups, meet new people, and enjoy playing together.
en.enrich_experience_desc: Expand your network, play new games, and share unforgettable moments with friends.
